00020 #include "keyboard_key.h"
00021 #include <qpainter.h>
00022 //#include <qbitmap.h>
00023 keyboard_key::keyboard_key(QWidget *parent, const char *name,QString strUpper,QString strLower,KEY_TYPE _type)
00024  : QPushButton(parent, name)
00025 {
00026    
00027    key_type=_type;
00028    xSetup(strUpper,strLower);
00029 }
00030 
00031 
00032 keyboard_key::~keyboard_key()
00033 {
00034 }
00035 void keyboard_key::xSetup(QString up,QString lo)
00036 { 
00037   //DAVID  set up
00038   pixInactive.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/keybtn.png");
00039   pixAcitve.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/keybtn-active.png");
00040   pixBackground=pixInactive;
00041   //QBitmap mask=QBitmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/key_btn_mask.png");
00042   //setMask(mask);
00043   resize(pixBackground.size());
00044   QFont serifFont( "Helvetica", 18, QFont::Bold );
00045   setFont(serifFont); 
00046   strCharUp=up;
00047   strCharLower=lo;
00048   //DAVID default is the lowercase
00049   upper=true;
00050   slotSetCase(upper);
00051   //setText(strCharLower);
00052   switch(key_type)
00053   {
00054    case KEY:
00055    
00056    connect(this,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(slotClicked()));
00057    break;
00058    
00059    case ENTER:
00060    
00061    connect(this,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(slotEnter()));
00062    break;
00063    
00064    case BACKSPACE:
00065    connect(this,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(slotBackSpace()));
00066    break;  
00067    
00068    case CHANGE:
00069    connect(this,SIGNAL(clicked()),this,SLOT(slotChange()));
00070    break; 
00071   }
00072   
00073   connect(this,SIGNAL(pressed()),this,SLOT(slotPressed()));
00074   connect(this,SIGNAL(released()),this,SLOT(slotReleased()));
00075 }
00076 
00077 void keyboard_key::slotSetCase(bool upper)
00078 {
00079    if(upper)
00080    strCurChar=strCharUp;
00081    else
00082    strCurChar=strCharLower;
00083    repaint();
00084 }
00085 
00086 void keyboard_key::slotClicked()
00087 {
00088    emit signalSendChar(strCurChar);
00089 }
00090 
00091 void keyboard_key::drawButton(QPainter *p)
00092 {
00093   p->drawPixmap(0,0,pixBackground);
00094   p->drawText( rect(), AlignCenter, strCurChar );
00095 }
00096 void keyboard_key::slotPressed()
00097 {
00098   pixBackground=pixAcitve;
00099   repaint();
00100 }
00101 void keyboard_key::slotReleased()
00102 {
00103  pixBackground=pixInactive;
00104  repaint();
00105 }
00106 void keyboard_key::slotSetPixmap(QPixmap inactive,QPixmap pix_active)
00107 {
00108    pixInactive=inactive;
00109    pixAcitve=pix_active;
00110    pixBackground=pixInactive;
00111    resize(pixBackground.size());
00112    repaint();
00113 }
00114 void keyboard_key::slotEnter()
00115 {
00116   emit signalEnter();
00117 }
00118 
00119 void keyboard_key::slotChange()
00120 {
00121   emit signalChange();
00122 }
00123 
00124 void keyboard_key::slotBackSpace()
00125 {
00126  emit signalBackSpace();
00127 }
